references.reason: This technical report provides an overview of the GPT-4 model, which is a significant advancement in large language models and serves as a foundational reference for understanding its capabilities and architecture.

This technical report introduces Internlm2, detailing the technical specifications and performance metrics of the model, which is notable for its advancements in language understanding and generation.

references.paper_title: OpenScholar: Synthesizing Scientific Literature with Retrieval-Augmented LMs
references.reason: This paper introduces OpenScholar, a system that uses retrieval-augmented language models to synthesize scientific literature, which is relevant for automated survey writing.

references.paper_title: Llama: Open and Efficient Foundation Language Models
references.reason: This paper presents LLaMA, an open and efficient foundation language model, contributing significantly to the accessibility and advancement of language model research.

references.paper_title: AutoSurvey: Large Language Models Can Automatically Write Surveys
references.reason: This paper introduces AutoSurvey, a system that explores the use of large language models for automated survey writing, providing a direct comparison and baseline for the proposed SurveyForge.
